JobFullDesc: About the Role  The Content Specialist role is built to support LoBs (Line of Businesses) and the Regional Content Team (LATAM Agent Success). The Content Specialists' time would be divided between handling content requests (e.g.: C360 requests from their market; helping with local content, participating in Regional Content Team projects; reviewing, translating & editing Saved Replies, Help Center & Knowledge Base; etc.). Content Specialists report to their respective TLs, but have a positive relationship with the rest of the Regional Content Team & their LoBs. What the Candidate Will Do  Receive and review content requests (Inputs from Lob - including policies -, C360, GSFs, Trello, etc)Research within Uber’s global KB, HC, SRs, Splashes, etc., for existing content to adapt and/or translateContent drafting: translate, adapt, edit, update and/or develop contentGet sign off from Content Strategists and/or Lob of every content piece draftedManage partners Basic Qualifications Relevant content experience, but we will consider candidates with less experience if they meet our other requirementsProficient in English (written and conversation)Good performance standing for the past 6 monthsOutstanding written and verbal communication skillsMeticulous attention to detailEase-to-follow processesGreat writing and grammar skills (Spanish and/or Portuguese, depending on market needs)Knowledge of writing tools (Docs, Word, etc)Proven track record to manage multiple projects and priorities in a fast-paced, dynamic environmentStrategic problem solving - You can demonstrate multiple resources to advise and support critical decisionsDesire to learn - You're a highly motivated self-starter, with an eagerness to learn and grow, and you are receptive to feedbackTeamwork - You value the importance of partnership and cultivate collaborationCustomer emotional intelligence - You have a deep understanding of the user experience and the ability to resolve customer support requests in unique and creative ways
